Name: Suspicious Figure
Description: You notice across a suspicious figure peaking out between trees in the forest, it disapears as you near closer.

Name: Vending Machine
Description: A vending machine! The glass is cracked so you cant see inside but the coin slot seems to be lit…

Name: Magical Pond
Description: You happen  upon a glowing pond on the side of the road, it seems to be charged with some kind of energy…

Name: Car Wash
Description: you spot a cave with a neon carwash sign visible from the outside

Name: Steep Hill
Description: You have to go up a steep hill but your cargo is too heavy
